name: Verify that user receives error message for empty Password Confirmation field during registration
description: This template is used for Registration process

steps.name: Given The user is on the new user registration page
When The user clicks Register button after entering Username and Password leaving Password Confirmation field empty from sheetname "register" and row 2
Then The error message Please fill out this field. appears below  Password Confirmation textbox
